attributes.action: Lobby Dublin Labour Council to scrap the law banning specific breeds from council property
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Dublin City Council has passed a law to ban the following dogs from council property, including a future ban on parks and open spaces. American Pit Bull Terrier, English Bull Terrier, Staffordshire Bull Terrier, Bull Mastiff, Doberman Pinscher,German Shepherd, Rhodesian Ridgeback, Rottweiler & Japanese Akita

The law came into force on July 1st and will lead to the unnecessary destruction of over 20000 dogs.

More emphasis needs to be placed on education of owners and preventing dangerous people owning the animals, not banning responsible owners from having them

Outright bans have not worked in other countries and have led to criminal activity involving certain breeds, being driven underground. Taken from ANVIL WEBSITE

We also urge the British Government not to introduce similar laws in the UK

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
